mapper.insert: INSERT INTO covi_smart4j.COLLAB_TEAM_EXEC (ExecYear, GroupId, RegisterCode, RegisteDate) (SELECT date_format(NOW(),'%Y'), b.groupid, #{USERID}, now() FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup a JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_group b ON a.DeptCode = b.GroupCode and b.GroupType='Dept' LEFT JOIN COVI_SMART4J.COLLAB_TEAM_EXEC c on b.groupid = c.groupid AND c.isClose='N' WHERE UserCode = #{USERID} AND c.GROUPID IS NULL AND b.IsUse='Y' AND b.IsDisplay ='Y')
mapper.select:
/* collab.common.getUserTeam */
SELECT Seq ,UserCode ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiCompanyName) AS CompanyName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiDeptName) AS DeptName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, MultiJobLevelName) AS JobLevelName ,a.CompanyCode ,DeptCode ,JobLevelCode , b.GroupID ,(SELECT covi_smart4j.Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},sou.MultiDisplayName) FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup ctm JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user sou on ctm.userCode = sou.userCode WHERE ctm.DeptCode = a.DeptCode LIMIT 1 ) TmUser ,(SELECT count(ctm.userCode) FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup ctm JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user sou on ctm.userCode = sou.userCode WHERE ctm.DeptCode = a.DeptCode) TmUserCnt ,c.ExecYear FROM sys_object_user_basegroup a JOIN COVI_SMART4J.SYS_OBJECT_GROUP b ON a.DEPTCODE = b.GROUPCODE and b.GroupType='Dept' JOIN COVI_SMART4J.COLLAB_TEAM_EXEC c on b.groupid = c.groupid AND c.isClose='N' WHERE UserCode = #{USERID} AND b.IsUse='Y' AND b.IsDisplay ='Y' ORDER BY if(JobType = 'Origin' ,0 ,1)

/* collab.common.getSubDeptList */ SELECT GroupID ,GroupCode ,CompanyCode ,GroupType ,MemberOf ,DisplayName ,MultiDisPlayName ,Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang},MultiDisPlayName) AS TransMultiDisplayName ,CHAR_LENGTH(SortPath) - CHAR_LENGTH(REPLACE(SortPath,';','')) SortDepth ,GroupPath FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_group WHERE GroupType IN ('Dept','Company')
AND GroupPath LIKE CONCAT(#{GR_GroupPath},'%')
AND GroupPath LIKE CONCAT('ORGROOT;',#{CompanyCode},';%')
AND IsUse = 'Y' AND IsDisplay = 'Y' AND MemberOf != 'NOUSE' ORDER BY SortPath asc
